reviews.review: This game does not have much to do, and most of the time comp is played on one map Mirage. Also some players are just toxic, some people hack at this time. Oh and valve doesn't even care from what it looks like they just want to profit off of skins.
Не тратьте свое время, а так валве опять сделали что-то.
Gra jest okey, polecam każdemu kto ma czas i chęci by popróbować swoich sił. Jednyny minus to ludzie grający na hackach, steam do dziś sobie z tym nie poradził dlatego FazeIt lepszy. Wciąga ;)
Polecam ale dużo smerfów i cheaterów
Всем гопникам с падика, а также любителям балтики девятки рекомендую
At the Age of ..+ n still playing
competitive play not for the weak. coming from someone who is trash at the game. takes a lot of practice but is well worth the time.
刚入门而已，但是很好玩
A pretty good balanced comptetitive game! Love it!
